definitions.meaning:
International Monetary Fund(The IMF is an international agency which tries to promote trade and improve economic conditions in poorer countries,
sometimes by lending them money. )
国际货币基金组织（联合国下属组织，关注贸易和经济的发展）

examples.content:
The IMF plan will not eliminate all the debt for Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone.
IMF的方案不会消除几内亚、利比里亚和塞拉利昂的全部债务，
